definition: Holland/the Netherlands/abbr. for 荷蘭|荷兰[He2 lan2]
to carry on one's shoulder or back/burden/responsibility
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: In the first few years after I moved there, lotus flowers continued to blossom on the surface of the pond.
sentences.chinese: 剛搬來的幾年，池塘裏還有荷花。

sentences.english: Although I like the seeds of spring, lingering summer lotus.
sentences.chinese: 雖然，我喜歡春日的萌芽，留戀夏日的荷花。

sentences.english: It is, however, to border on vulgarity to make such realistic designs as fish, deer, lotus or crane.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎粗魯的製作如魚，鹿，荷花或鶴的圖案。

sentences.english: The lotus grows in ponds and lakes; so does the water lily.
sentences.chinese: 荷花在池塘和湖泊中生長，水浮蓮也是如此。

sentences.english: The little turtle lived in the lotus pond.
"Goin' to the Lotus Club dance to-night?" Jim demanded.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上去荷花俱樂部參加舞會麼？

sentences.english: This site was flanked by a pair of lotus ponds, _and_to the north was a round fountain.
sentences.chinese: 五竹亭北設有圓形噴水池，左右爲荷花池。

sentences.english: I hoped the carefree young girl in the lotus flower station ugg short thought of to together smile.
sentences.chinese: 我望着荷花亭中無憂無慮的少女，想起了齊笑。

sentences.english: The lotus blooms in the sight of the sun， and loses all that it has.
sentences.chinese: 荷花在日中開放，丟掉了自己的一切所有。

sentences.english: Lotus reincarnation reaches poor Home He, name element daughter.
sentences.chinese: 荷花投胎至貧苦的何家，取名素女。

sentences.english: Three children are playing in the garden by a colorful porcelain cistern planted with pink lotuses.
sentences.chinese: 三名童子在庭中戲水船，彩瓷缸開放著粉色的荷花。

sentences.english: By jasmine and orchids, it shows Magnolia precious aroma.
sentences.chinese: 茉莉與依蘭花，更顯出荷花玉蘭的珍貴香氣。

sentences.english: Judiao seeing this old man on the knifing, and dragons were quick to jump lotus pond.
sentences.chinese: 老頭兒見狀舉刀就砍，小龍連忙躍人荷花池中。

sentences.english: There is a house on the hill. A house is by the lotus pond.
sentences.chinese: 有一間房子在山坡上，房子的旁邊有一個荷花池。

sentences.english: Lotus in different poses and with different expressions, the pure white, pure as crystal.
sentences.chinese: 荷花千姿百態，潔白無暇，像水晶一樣純潔。

sentences.english: The muddy pond changed into a beautiful lotus pond after harnessing.
sentences.chinese: 經過治理，這片爛泥塘成了漂亮的荷花塘。

definition: Mudan District of Heze City 菏澤市|菏泽市[He2 ze2 Shi4], Shandong/Mutan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
lotus flower (Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn, among others)/water-lily
